item.title: JTabbedPane/GamePanel
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

I added my ‘gamePanel’ into a JTabbedPane in my GUI class using this code:

         gamePanel = new JPanel();
         gamePanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
         gamePanel.add(this);
         gamePanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(765, 503));
         JTabbedPane jtp1 = new JTabbedPane();
         jtp1.addTab("Applet", icon, gamePanel, "Applet");
         mainFrame.setContentPane(jtp1);

and the Tab’s name is ‘Center’:

When the name is supposed to be ‘Applet’.
Please help. ;D

Read full topic
